name: Stranger
storyline: Make it to 6 am when the police arrive to find yourself uncovering the mystery that lies behind this Stranger.
summary: Stranger is a VR and first person lore-driven horror game where you defend your house against an unknown enemy. Make use of the provided locks and lock the windows when you hear the Stranger nearby. You can choose different levels of difficulty and choose from different maps and uncover the story of your player, the Stranger, and more. Hidden stories and lore-driven cryptic messages will be left to be discovered.
